column2:
(5) {@“agi gatau”@} (bhvAdiH-1-146-saka. se. para.) 

aGgan-ntI, aGgiSyan-ntI-tI, aGgayan-ntI, aGgayiSyan-ntI-tI;

  aJjigiSan-ntI ityAdirUpANi vinA, avaziSTAni aki (2.) dhAtuvat boddhavyAni| 

asya dhAtorauNAdike nipratyaye nalope (aGgati = jvAlArUpeNodrdhvaM gacchati ityarthe) agniH|| [pRSTham0007+ 27] 

saMjJAyAM ghaH = aGgam| prazastAni aGgAni yasyAH sA = aGganA| ‘aGgAt kalyANe’ (ga. sU, -5-2-100) iti pAmAditvAt naH pratyayaH| ‘vila- GgadeNaM zabarAGganAjanapravaGgitaM maGgaladhenutaGgitam’ dhA-kA. 1-20.

(6) {@‘aghi gatyAkSepe’@} (bhvAdiH-1-109-saka. seT-A.) gatyAkSepo = nindA (gatau-gatyArambhe ca)| 

aGghakaH-GghikA, aJjighiSakaH-SikA, ityAdirUpANi ‘aki lakSaNe’ 

(2.) iti dhAtuvad bodhyAni| aGghitam = bhAve ktaH ‘araGki kolairlaghu tadrathasvanAt prabuddhya siMhaiH punaraGghitaM sadA’ dhA. kA-1-15.
(8) {@‘aGga pade lakSaNe ca’@} (10-1928-curAdiH-saka. seT-ubha-) adantaH| pUrvadhAtuvat (7) sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni|

(14) {@‘aThi gatau’@} (1-bhvAdiH-261-saka. se-A.) \n\n‘aki lakSaNe’ (2.) iti dhAtuvadrUpANi jJeyAni| kvipi an-iti rUpam| saMyogAntalopaH| na + an = [[A. ‘anan kumArgeSu zubhAdhvanaiva van praman bhRzotkaNThitagopike harau|’ dhA. kA. 1. 35]] anan|

(15) {@‘aDa udyamane’@} (1-bhvAdiH-358-saka. se. para.) \n\nzatari aDan [[B. ‘praroDakAnaGgavilolitairvRtAn ratAvaDadbhiH lalanAjanaiH khalaiH|’ dhA. kA. 1. 46.]]| aDatItyaDaH = vRzcikalAGgUlaH| viziSTo'DaH = vyaDaH| tasyApatyamata iJ vyADiH AcAryaH| saMgrahanAmakasya lakSagranthaparimitasya vyAkaraNa- zAstrasya kartA pANinerbhAgineyaH| svAgatAditvAt AdivRddhipratiSedhaH| iti mA. dhA. vRttiH| anyAni sarvANi rUpANi ‘aTa gatau’ (11) itivat bodhyAni|
(22) {@‘adi bandhane’@} (1-bhvAdiH-62-saka. se. para-) dhAtorasya pUrvalikhitAntativat (20) sarvANi rUpANi bodhyAni|

(25) {@“ancu gatau yAcane ca”@} (1-bhvAdiH-862. ubha. saka. se.) \n\n‘gatiyAcanayoraJcatyaJcate, Nau vizeSaNe| aJcayatyaJcatItyekaM gatipUjana- yorapi||’ iti (zlo 50) devaH| zAnaci-aJcamAnaH, aJciSyamANaH, aJci- ciSamANaH, aJciciSiSyamANaH, ityAdirUpANi adhikAni| avaziSTAni gatipUjanArthaka (24) dhAtau gatyarthakadhAtuvat jJeyAni| ‘aci’ iti pAThe tu niSThAyAM aJcitaH ityekameva rUpam| ‘aniditAm--’ (6-4-24) iti nalopo na bhavati| “acu” iti pAThe tu acan-acantI ityAdirUpANi| ktvAyAm, ‘udito vA’ (7-2-56) itIDvikalpaH--acitvA-aktvA iti rUpe| niSThAyAM tu ‘yasya vibhASA’ (7-2-15) iti vacanAt aktam-ityekameva rUpam|

(26) {@‘ancu vizeSaNe’@} (10-curAdiH-1739. ubha. se.) \n\nvizeSaNam = vyAvartanam| uditkaraNAt vibhASito Nic| ‘gati- yAcanayoraJcatyaJcate Nau vizeSaNe| aJcayatyaJcatItyekaM gatipUjanayorapi||’ iti (zlo-50) devaH| NicpakSe gatipUjanArthakadhAtau (24) NijantarUpANIva, NijabhAvapakSe ca bhauvAdikagatyarthakA (24) JcudhAtuvadrUpANIti ca jJeyAni|| [pRSTham0025+ 30]
(30) {@“abhi zabde”@} (1-bhvAdiH-385. aka. se. A.) (29) ambativadrUpANi sarvANi jJeyAni|
(38) {@‘arja arjane’@} (1-bhvAdiH-224-saka. seT. para.) \n\npUjArthaka-bhauvAdikArcati (36) vadrUpANi sarvANyapyasya jJeyAni|

(43) {@“arva hiMsAyAm”@} (1-bhvAdiH-584. saka. seT. para.) arvaka^AH-rvikA, arviviSakaH-SikA, ityAdikAni (42) arbativadrUpANi sarvANi jJeyAni| ^A ‘apharvitAkAGkSitamarvakaM satAM mAMsAdisaJcarvakaduSTabharvakam| karvadvadhUkelirasena kharvitaM garvArvakaM zarvapareNa sarvatAm||’ dhA. kA. 1-74

(45A) {@“arha pUjAyAm”@} (10-curAdiH-1831. saka. se. ubha.) AdhRSIyaH| ‘--pUjane'rhati cArhayet|’ (197) iti devaH|) \n\n‘AdhRSAdvA’ (gaNasUtraM curAdau) iti Nico vaikalpikatvam| Nija- ntAt pUjArthaka-caurAdikA (45) rhayativat, NijabhAvapakSe bhauvAdikArhativat (44) ca rUpANi jJeyAni| zAkaTAyanamate NijabhAvapakSe AtmanepadI| tadAnIM zAnaci ‘arhamANaH’ iti rUpam--iti vizeSaH|
(50) {@“aSa gatidIptyAdAneSu”@} (1-bhvAdiH-886-saka-seT-ubhayapadI) \n\nuttaratra vilekhyamAnasya asa (51) dhAtoH pAThabhedo'yam-tadvat sarvANi rUpANi bodhyAni| [pRSTham0049+ 25]

(65) {@“igi gatyarthaH”@} (1-bhvAdiH-153. saka. se. para.) \n\niGgakaH-GgikA- [[A. ‘vAcaMyamAn sthaNDilazAyinazca yuyu- kSamANAn anizaM mumukSUn| adhyA- payantaM vinayAt praNemuH padgAH bharadvAjamuniM saziSyam||’ bha. kA. 3-41.]] iGgitam-taH-tavAn, ityAdIni sarvANyapi pUrvoktekhi- (64) dhAtuvadrUpANi jJeyAni|

(67) {@“iTa gatau”@} (1-bhvAdiH-318-saka. seT. para.) eTakaH-TikA, eTakaH-TikA, eTiTiSakaH-SikA, eTan [[D. “ceTairbiTaizcAnugatAn aveTakaireTatpa- zUtkeTirajaH kaTan malAn||” dhA. kA. 1-42.]] -ntI, ityAdIni rUpANi ‘ikha’ (63) dhAtuvat bodhyAni| [pRSTham0068+ 23]

(76) {@“iSa AbhIkSNye”@} (9-kryAdiH-1525. saka. seT. para.) ‘iSNAtyAbhIkSNye, icchAyAM icched, gatyartha iSyati|’ (zlo. 168) iti devaH| \n\n‘iSestakAre zyanpratyayAt pratiSedho vaktavya’ (vA. 7-2-48) iti vacanAn asyApi dhAtoH tAderArddhadhAtukasya iDvikalpaH| tadAnIM zuddhAddhAtoH (75) icchArthakadhAtuvat, NyantAt sannantAcca (74) iSadhAtuvacca rUpANi jJeyAni| zatari paraM--iSNan-tI (‘kryAdibhyaH znA’ (3-1-81) iti znApratyayaH| ‘znAbhyastayorAtaH’ (6-4-112) iti AkAralope rUpam) iti vizeSaH| AbhIkSNyaM = paunaHpunyam, bhRzArtho vA| tadviSayAyAM kriyAyAmityarthaH|

(88) {@“ISa gatihiMsAdarzaneSu”@} (1-bhvAdiH-611-saka. seT. Atma.) ‘ISatItISa uJche'rthe, gatyAdAvISate bhavet|’ (zlo-169) iti devaH| \n\nIjadhAtuvat (81) rUpANi jJeyAni| manISA--‘gurozca halaH’ (3-3-103) iti apratyayaH| ‘zakandhvAdiSu TeH pararUpaM vAcyam’ (6-1-94) iti pararUpam| manasa ISA = manISA| ISitavAn [[A. ‘saMklezitasvakathadakSaNadIkSitaM taM prekSyaiSa janmaphalamISitavAn mahAtmA||’ dhA. kA. 1-77.]]|

(89) {@“ISa uJche”@} (1-bhvAdiH-684-saka. seT-para.) ‘ISatItISa uJche'rthe, gatyAdAvISate bhavet|’ (zlo-169) iti devaH| \n\nISan-ntI, ISiSyan-ntI-tI, ISayan-ntI, ISayiSyan-ntI-tI, ISiSiSan-ntI, ISiSiSiSyan-ntI-tI, iti zatari paraM vizeSaH| ghaJi ISaH [[B. ‘zUSan dRzoramRtayUSamajUSakastvaM bhUSasyanUSamatirISabhujAM priyaH kSmAm||’ dhA. kA. 1-86.]]| anyAni rUpANi sarvANyapi IjadhAtuvat (81) jJeyAni|

(90) {@“Iha ceSTAyAm”@} (1-bhvAdiH-632. aka. seT. Atma.) Ija gatikutsanayoH--(81) iti dhAtuvat sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni| \n\nabhidhAnasvAbhAvyAt striyAM karmavyatIhAre'pi Nac neSTa iti, tena vyatIhA-ityeva rUpamiti ca bhASye|
(93) {@“ukhi gatau”@} (1-bhvAdiH-129-saka. seT-para.) gatyarthakeGkhativat (64) sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni|

(97) {@“uchi uJche”@} (6-tudAdiH-1254-saka. seT. para.) ‘zazaporuJchatItyuJche svarabhedAd dvirucyate|’ (zlo-55) iti devaH| \n\nzatari paraM [[C. ‘vRkNavyAcarasoJchatI phalagaNAnavyuJchitAyAM nizi snAntI narcchati micchitA sujanatA yasmin hitaM jarjatI|’ dhA. kA. 2-73.]] uJchatI-uJchantI iti rUpam| ‘AcchInadyornum’ (7-1-80) iti numo vaikalpikatvam| anyat sarvamapi bhauvAdikoJchativat (96) jJeyam|

(99) {@“uchI vivAse”@} (6-tudAdiH-1295-saka. seT-para.) 

‘zazaporuJchatItyuJche svarabhedAd dvirucyate| ucchatIti vivAse syAt idito'niditastayoH||’ (zlo-55) iti devaH| [pRSTham0097+ 26] 

‘atikramaNabandhanavarjaneSu ca drume--’ iti dhAtukAvye| zatari ucchan- ntI-tI-iti rUpANi, ‘AcchInadyornum--’ (7-1-80) iti numo baikalpi- katvAt| anyAni sarvANyapi rUpANi bhauvAdikocchativat (98) jJeyAni| [[A. ‘vRkNavyAcarasoJchatI phalagaNan avyucchitAyAM nizi snAntI narcchati micchitA sujanatA yasmin hitaM jarjatI|’ dhA. kA. 2-73.]] ucchitam|

(100-A) {@“uTha upaghAte”@} (1-bhvAdiH-338-saka. seT. para.) \n\n[[A. ‘vanAzrayatve'pi sakAThaparyaThadraThan mRgAlIhaThakarmavarjitAn| roThan nRzaMsAluThitairanoThakairvRtAn dhanADhyairmaNipIThasaMzrayaiH||’ dhA. kA. 1-44.]] oThakaH-ThikA, oThakaH-ThikA, oTiThiSakaH-SikA--ityAdIni sarvANyapi rUpANi ukha (92) dhAtuvajjJeyAni|

(115) {@“USa rujAyAm”@} (1-bhvAdiH-683. saka. seT. para.) \n\n‘UTha upaghAte’ (110) iti dhAtuvat sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni| [[3. ‘anyebhyo'pi dRzyante’ (3-2-75) iti maninpratyaye ‘neD vazi kRti’ (7-2-8) itINNiSedhaH| USmA = uSNam|]] USmA, [[4. USaNam = maricam| vyUSaNaM = trikaTukam-iti kSIrataraGgiNyAm|]] USaNam USaH [[A. ‘zUSan dRzoramRtayUSamajUSakatvaM bhUSasyanUSamatirISabhujAM priyaH kSmAm||’ dhA. kA. 1-86.]] = pacAdyac| [pRSTham0115+ 26]

(126) {@“Rdhu vRddhau”@} (5-svAdiH.-1271. aka. seT. para.) 

‘RdhnotIti bhaved vRddhau RdhyatItyatra tu zyani|’ (zlo. 122) iti devaH| 

asya dhAtoH pUrvokta (125) daivAdika RdhudhAtuvat sarvatra rUpANi jJeyAni| zatari paraM Rdhnuvan-vatI, iti rUpamiti vizeSaH| svAditvAt [pRSTham0129+ 23] ‘svAdibhyaH znuH’ (3-1-73) iti znuH pratyayaH| znupratyayasya ‘sArvadhAtukamapit’ (1-2-4) iti GidvadbhAvAtidezAt guNo na| uvaG|

(132) {@“ejR kampane”@} (1-bhvAdiH-234. saka. seT. para.) \n\n‘dIptau zapyejate tatra, bhavedejati kampane|’ (zlo-58) iti devaH| ejan-ntI, ejiSyan-ntI-tI, iti zatari rUpamiti vizeSaH| anyAni sarvANi rUpANi dIptyarthakabhauvAdikejativat (131) bodhyAni|
(135) {@“eSR prayatne gatau ca”@} (1-bhvAdiH-618. saka. seT. Atma.) \n\ndIptyarthakabhauvAdikaijativat (131) sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni| kvipi tu eT iti rUpam| ‘jhalAM jazo'nte’ (8-2-39) iti jaztvam|

(143) {@“kage nocyate”@} (1-bhvAdiH-791.-aka. seT. para. ghaTAdiH|) \n\nasyAyamartha iti viziSya nocyate-kriyAsAmAnyArthatvAt ityeke| anekArthatvAt-ityanye| zuddhAt-sannantAt-yaGantAcca, dhAtorasya kakhativat (141) rUpANi sarvANyapi jJeyAni| NyantAt tu ‘kakhe hasane’ (142) iti ghaTAdidhAtuvat jJeyAni||
(147) {@“kaTe varSAvaraNayoH”@} (1-bhvAdiH-294. saka. seT. para.) \n\nkATakaH-TikA, kATakaH-TikA, cikaTiSakaH-SikA, cAkaTakaH-TikA, iti sarvANyapi rUpANi ‘kakha hasane’ (141) iti dhAtoriva jJeyAni|

(150) {@“kaThi zoke”@} (10-curAdiH-1848. aka. seT. ubha.) ‘--atha kaNThate| zoke syAt kaNThayet kaNThet, kaThe syAt kRcchrajIvane||’ (zlo. 79) iti devaH| prAyeNotpUrvaH utkaNThArthakaH| 

idittvAt NijvikalpaH| NijabhAvapakSe utkaNThakaH-cikaNThiSakaH, cAkaNThakaH-ityAdIni sarvANyapi rUpANi bhauvAdikakaNThativat (149) jJeyAni| NijabhAvapakSe ‘zeSAt kartari parasmaipadam’ (1-3-78) iti zAstrAt zatari utkaNThan- [[A. ‘striyazcotkaNThantyo dadRzurajitaM mRSTatanavaH nRpastvetannAmarSata ripujanAdharSitabalaH||’ dhA. kA. 3-52.]] ntI, utkaNThiSyan-ntI-tI, iti rUpamiti vizeSaH| NyantAt sani tu-- 

cikaNThayiSakaH-SikA, cikaNThayiSitA-trI, cikaNThayiSan-ntI, cikaNThayiSiSyan-ntI-tI, cikaNThayiSamANaH, cikaNThayiSiSyamANaH, cikaNThayiSitaH-tavAn, cikaNThayiSuH, cikaNThayiSitavyam, cikaNThayiSa- NIyam, cikaNThayiSyam, cikaNThayiSyamANaH, ISaccikaNThayiSaH, [pRSTham0149+ 26] duzcikaNThayiSaH-sucikaNThayiSaH, cikaNThayiSaH, cikaNThayiSitum, cikaNTha- yiSA, cikaNThayiSaNam, cikaNThayiSitvA, saJcikaNThayiSya, cikaNThayiSam 2-- cikaNThayiSitvA 2, ityAdIni rUpANi--iti vizeSaH|
(151) {@“kaDa made”@} (1-bhvAdiH-360. saka. seT. para.) \n\nkADakaH-DikA, kADakaH-DikA, cikaDiSakaH-SikA, cAkaDakaH-DikA, iti sarvANyapi rUpANi bhauvAdikakaThadhAtuvat (148) bodhyAni|

(152) {@“kaDa made”@} (6-tudAdiH-1380. saka. seT. para. kuTAdiH|) \n\nzatari param-kaDan-ntI-tI, iti rUpam| ‘AcchInadyornum’ (7-1-80) iti num vikalpaH| anyatra sarvatrApi bhauvAdikakaThativat-- (148) rUpANi jJeyAni| DakArAntaprakaraNAt asya kuTAdau pAThaH| kuTAdi- pAThasya phalaM kimapi na|

(153) {@“kaDi bhedane”@} (1-bhvAdiH-282. saka. seT. Atma.) \n\n‘kaNDayediti bhede Nau, made tu zapi kaNDate|’ (zlo. 86) iti devaH| kaNDakaH-NDikA, kaNDakaH-NDikA, cikaNDiSakaH-SikA, cAkaNDakaH- NDikA-ityAdIni rUpANi bhauvAdikakaNThativat (149) jJeyAni|

(154) {@“kaDi made”@} (1-bhvAdiH-360. aka. seT. para.) ‘kaDa made’ (151) ityasya pAThAntaramidam| \n\nkaNDakaH-NDikA, kaNDakaH-NDikA, cikaNDiSakaH-SikA, cAkaNDakaH- NDikA-ityAdIni sarvANyapi rUpANi bhauvAdikakaNTativat (149) jJeyAni|

(155) {@“kaDi bhedane”@} (10-curAdiH-1582. saka. seT. ubha.) \n\n‘kaNDayediti bhede Nau, made tu zapi kaNDate|’ (zlo-86) iti devaH| idittvANNico vaikalpikatvam| NijabhAvapakSe--kaNDakaH-NDikA, cikaNDiSakaH-SikA, cAkaNDakaH-NDikA, ityAdIni rUpANi ‘kaThi zoke’ (149) iti bhauvAdikadhAtuvat jJeyAni| NicpakSe tu kaNDakaH-NDikA, cikaNDayiSakaH-SikA, ityAdIni rUpANi caurAdikakaNThayativat (150) jJeyAni| [pRSTham0150+ 26]
(171) {@“karta zaithilye”@} (10-curAdiH-1915. saka. seT. ubha.) adantaH| ‘karNa bhedane’ (170) iti dhAtuvadrUpANi sarvANi jJeyAni| [pRSTham0168+ 24]
(172) {@“karda kutsite zabde”@} (1-bhvAdiH-59. aka. seT. para.) kutsitazabdaH = kaukSaravaH| ‘karja vyathane’ (169) iti bhauvAdikadhAtuvat sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni|

(177) {@“kalla avyakte zabde”@} (1-bhvAdiH-498. aka. seT. Atma.) \n\n‘kattha zlAghAyAm’ (160) iti bhauvAdikadhAtuvat sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni| ‘kalla azabde’ iti dhAtumamuM kSIrasvAmyAdayaH paThanti| ‘azabdaH = tUSNImbhAvaH’ iti ca vivRNvanti|

(181) {@“kasa gatizAsanayoH”@} (2-adAdiH-1024. saka. seT. Atma.) \n\n‘kasi’ iti upari vilekhyamAnasya pAThAntaro'yam| bhauvAdikakasa- dhAtuvat (180) sarvANi rUpANi jJeyAni| zAnaci param--kasAnaH, kasi- SyamANaH, kAsayamAnaH, kAsayiSyamANaH, cikasiSamANaH, cikasiSiSyamANaH, canIkasyamAnaH, canIkasiSyamANaH, iti rUpANIti vizeSaH|

(187) {@“kAzR dIptau”@} (4-divAdiH-1162. saka. seT. Atma.) \n\n‘--kAzeH dIptau kAzyeta kAzate|’ (zlo. 165) iti devaH| kAzyamAnaH, kAziSyamANaH, kAzayamAnaH, kAzayiSyamANaH, cikAziSamANaH, cikAziSiSyamANaH, cAkAzyamAnaH, cAkAziSyamANaH, iti zAnaci rUpANi| anyAni sarvANi rUpANi bhauvAdikakAzRdhAtuvat (186) jJeyAni|
(191) {@“kiTa gatau”@} (1-bhvAdiH-319. saka. seT. para.) sarvANyapi rUpANi pUrvokta ‘kiTa’ (190) dhAtuvat jJeyAni|

(199) {@“kuG (Arta) zabde”@} (6-tudAdiH-1401. aka. ani. Atma.) kuTAdiH| ‘avyaktazabde kavate, kuvate tvArtazabdane| kautIti zabdamAtre syAt--’ (zlo. 23) iti devaH| kAvakaH-vikA, kAvakaH-vikA, cukUSakaH-SikA, cokUyakaH-yikA;\n\n  ityAdirUpANi AdAdika (196) kudhAtuvat NyantAt sannantAt yaGantAcca jJeyAni| zuddhAddhAtoH kuTAditvAt rUpANi likhyante-- [pRSTham0195+ 24] [[1. ‘gAGkuTAdibhyo'JNinGit’ (1-2-1) iti GidvadbhAvAt guNo na|]] kutA-trI, [[2. ‘tudAdibhyaH zaH’ (3-1-77) iti zaH| uvaG|]] kuvamAnaH, [[A. ‘nUtyA kiM bhayadhUtavidrutaguvallokaM tadA taddhruvat- kodaNDaM kuvamAnamaikSi dalitaM bhojezvarAkUtavat||’ dhA. kA. 2-82.]] kuSyamANaH, kut-kutau-kutaH, kutam-taH-tavAn, kuvaH, kutavyam, kuvanIyam, [[3. GidvadbhAvAt yati guNo na|]] kuyam, [[4. ‘orAvazyake’ (3-1-125) iti Nyat| NittvAt GittvaM na|]] avazyakAvyam, ISatkuvaH-duSkuvaH- sukuvaH, kUyamAnaH, kuvaH, kutum, kutiH, kuvanam, kutvA, avakutya, kAvam 2, kutvA 2, [[5. ‘kuvaH kraran’ (da. u. 8-63) iti kraran pratyayaH| kuraraH = pakSivizeSaH|]] kuraraH iti|

(201) {@“kuca samparcanakauTilyapratiSTambhavilekhaneSu”@} (1-bhvAdiH-857. saka. seT. para.) jvalAdiH| ‘saGkoce kucatIti syAt, kocet samparcanAdiSu|’ (zlo-54) iti devaH| jvalAditvAt ‘jvalitikasantebhyo NaH’ (3-1-140) iti kartari vA NaH pratyayaH| [[A. ‘sehe ca rAmAjanakhelanaM yA kucorusIdatparizadrutoyA| krozairjanAH kocagalAn marAlAn bodhanti yatrAmburuhAM vikAse||’ dhA. kA. 2. 24.]] kocaH-kucaH| anupasRSTAdeva| upasRSTAttu utkocaH| anyAni sarvANi rUpANi kucaghAtuvat (200) jJeyAni|

Atma.) bhraMzakaH-zikA, bhrazakaH-zikA, bibhraMziSakaH-SikA, [[1. bhvAdiSu ‘sransu dhvansu bhransu avasraMsane’ iti paThyate| atra ‘bhransu’ ityasya sthAne maitreya-kSIrasvAmi-bodhinyAsa-sammatAkAra-kavikalpadrumakAra- prabhRtibhiH ‘bhranzu’ iti pATho'GgIkRtaH| siddhAntakaumudyAdiSu pakSabhedena pATho'yamurarIkRtazca| evameva, ‘nIg vaJcusraMsudhvaMsubhraMsu--’ (7-4-84) ityatrApi etaissarvairapi bhranzu ityeva pATho'GgIkRtaH| evaJcAtra yaGante, eteSAM mate nIgAgame, yaGnimittaka upadhAnakAralope ca rUpamevam| anyeSAM mate tu ‘dIrgho'kitaH’ (7-4-83) ityabhyAsasya dIrghe bAbhrAzakaH ityAdIni rUpANi yaGante sarvatra jJeyAni|]] banIbhraMzakaH-bAbhrazakaH- zikA;\n\n  ityAdIni sarvANyapi rUpANi bhauvAdikadhvaMsativat (942) jJeyAni| niSThAyAm [[2. udittvena ktvAyAmiDvikalpanAnniSThAyAmiNniSedhaH| upadhAnakAralopaH, zakArasya Satvam, niSThAtakArasya STutvena TakAra iti cAtra prakriyA jJeyA| evameva ktinnAdiSvapi prakriyohyA|]] bhraSTam-bhraSTaH-bhraSTavAn, ktini--bhraSTiH, ktvAyAm-bhraMzitvA- bhraSTvA, kvipi- [[3. vAho'zvaH| tasmAd bhraMzate ityarthe ‘kvip ca’ (3-2-76) iti kvipi zakArasya ‘vrazca--’ (8-2-36) ityAdinA SakAre, tasya jaztvena DakAre cartvavikalpe, ‘anyeSAmapi dRzyate’ (6-3-137) iti pUrvapadasya dIrghe ca vAhAbhraT iti rUpam| kvacid vAhabhraT iti pATho dRSTaH, tadAnIM dIrghaH pUrvapadasya neti jJeyam|]] vAhAbhraT-vAhabhraD-vAhabhraT-bhrazau-bhrazaH, iti ca rUpANIti vizeSaH|

(atra dhAtukAvye, kSIrataraGgiNyAM ca zatari, bhrAmyan ityeva dIrghapAThaH paridRzyate| paraM tu daivAdikasyaiva bhramudhAtoH ‘zamAmaSTAnAM dIrghnaH zyani’ (7-3-74) iti dIrghavidhAnAd bhauvAdikasyAsya dIrghAprasakteH mudraNAzuddhireva granthadvaye'pi prakRtasthale iti manISayA'smAbhiH bhramyan iti zAstrIyapATha evAdRta iti jJeyam|)]] bhramyan, [pRSTham0979+ 28] [[1. ‘jvalitikasantebhyo NaH’ (3-1-140) iti kartari vA NapratyayaH| pakSe'cpratya- yazca| NapratyayapakSe'pi, ‘nodAttopadeza--’ (7-3-34) iti vRddhiniSedhaH| kSIrasvAmI tu “Ne bhrAmaH| bhramaH iti durgaH|” iti rUpe pradarzitavAn| ‘niSedhAzca balI- yAMsaH’ (paribhASA 122) iti nyAyena vRddhiniSedha evAtra NapratyayapakSe'pi nyAyya iti pratibhAti|]] bhramaH-bhramaH, yuci- [[2. ‘calanazabdArthAd--’ (3-2-148) iti tacchIlAdiSu kartRSu yuc| Natvam|]] bhramaNaH, kvipi- [[3. kvipi, ‘UG ca gamAdInAmiti vaktavyam’ (vA. 6-4-40) iti vacanena anunAsikalope, dhAtvakArasya UkArAdeze ca rUpamevam| kAzikAdiSu agrebhrUH ityudAhRtam| bhASye tu prakRtasUtre (6-4-40) bhrUH ityevodAhRtam|]] agrebhrUH-subhrUH-subhruvau-subhruvaH, [[4. ‘ik kRSyAdibhyaH’ (vA. 3-3-108) iti bhAve striyAmikpratyayaH|]] bhramiH, [[5. urasA bhramatIti urabhraH = meSaH| ‘anyeSvapi dRzyate’ (3-2-101) iti Dapratyaye, pRSodarAditvAt (6-3-109) urazzabdasakArasya lope ca rUpamevam| kecittu uru bhramatIti vyutpattiM kRtvA, pRSodarAditvAdeva uruzabdastharephottaro- kArasyAkAre ca rUpaM sAdhayanti|]] urabhraH, [[6. ‘bhrameH samprasAraNaM ca’ (da. u. 1-49) itInpratyaye, pratyayasya kittvena samprasAraNe ca rUpamevam| bhRmiH = vAyuH|]] bhRmiH, [[7. ‘arttikamibhrami--’ (da. u. 8-62) ityaranpratyaye rUpamevam| bhramaraH = aliH|]] bhramaraH, ityAdIni rUpANyasya vizeSeNa bhavantIti vizeSaH|
